ModMetaData.name: Better ModMismatch Window
ModMetaData.author: Madeline
ModMetaData.description:
==english description== this mod provides a new GUI Window for the Mod mismatch window instead of default CUI one. including version mismatch checking.
this mod uses Manifest.xml for version checking, introduced by Fluffy's Mod manager. if you're a developer and you want to add version support, please add version in Manifest.xml !
check Fluffy's Mod manager Github page for detailed description.
